info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 31 at 8:47PM MST until August 31 at 9:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MST FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 846 PM MST, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located 14 miles northwest of Dolan Springs, or 26 miles southeast of Boulder City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees, with blowing dust and frequent cloud to ground lightning. Locations impacted include... Lake Mead National Recreation Area. This includes the following roads... Highway 93 in Mohave County between mile markers 19 and 35. Temple Bar Road between mile markers 1 and 12, and between mile markers 14 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
